body_html: I noticed a similar bug as well, it also is a function of when you do ctrl-c, quite often I've had TensorFlow crash the driver. I presume there must be a NVIDIA driver bug as well, since a user process should never be able to crash a kernel driver...
body_text: I noticed a similar bug as well, it also is a function of when you do ctrl-c, quite often I've had TensorFlow crash the driver. I presume there must be a NVIDIA driver bug as well, since a user process should never be able to crash a kernel driver...
